step_data.thought:
Based on the accessibility tree and my past actions, I can see that I'm already on the Widgets page. The page shows the heading 'Widgets' and displays a list of widget instances. I can confirm this from the URL which is 'http://127.0.0.1:7780/admin/admin/widget_instance/'. The page shows 17 widget instances, which are dynamic content elements that can be managed from this section.

Since I've successfully reached the Widgets section where dynamic content elements can be managed, I should inform the user that we've completed the goal.
step_data.action: stop('You are now in the Widgets section where you can manage dynamic content elements. This page displays 17 widget instances that can be edited, deleted, or you can add new widgets using the "Add Widget" button at the top of the page.')
